parameters.query: SELECT pm.id, pm.title, pm.title_en, pm.description, pm.description_en, pm.ebay_category_id, cm.category_mappings FROM products_master pm LEFT JOIN category_mappings cm ON pm.id = cm.product_id WHERE pm.id = $1

parameters.jsCode:
const data = $input.first().json;
return [{ json: { ...data, mappings: data.cached_mappings, source: 'cached' } }];

parameters.query: INSERT INTO category_mappings (product_id, category_mappings, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ($1, $2::jsonb, NOW(), NOW()) ON CONFLICT (product_id) DO UPDATE SET category_mappings = $2::jsonb, updated_at = NOW()
